title: Task Manager
description: This task management application was built using a combination of HTML, Jinja, Django, and Python to provide a dynamic and user-friendly platform for creating, managing, editing, and deleting tasks. The front-end uses HTML for structure, with Jinja templates enabling efficient dynamic content rendering. The back-end is powered by Django, a powerful Python framework, to handle task logic and database interactions. For version control, I utilized Git, ensuring smooth collaboration and easy tracking of changes throughout the development process. The application is containerized using Docker, which allows for seamless deployment and portability. I deployed the system on a Debian-based Linux environment running on a Raspberry Pi.
